items.sentence: I didn\'t have a chance to visit Tom when I was in Boston.
Tom is much closer to his mother than he is to his father.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be here later.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be interested.
When I first met Tom, I thought he was a little obnoxious.
When I was thirteen, my dad bought me my own fishing boat.
When I was young, I used to go swimming in a nearby creek.
Tom lived with his uncle in Boston while going to college.
Tom forgot to tell Mary to take the bread out of the oven.
Tom had a pretty good excuse for not being here yesterday.
